sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PrincipalClass</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Utility to get list of Principal or non-Principal classes for CMDB</description>
        <name>PrincipalClass</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PrincipalClass = Class.create();
PrincipalClass.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getPrincipalClasses: function() {
		return this.getClasses(true);
	},
	
	getNonPrincipalClasses: function() {
		return this.getClasses(false);
	},

	getClasses: function(principal) {
		var classes = [];
		var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_class_info');
		gr.addQuery('principal_class', principal);
		gr.query();
		while(gr.next() && gr.canRead())
			classes.push(gr.getValue('class'));
		
		return classes;
	},

    type: 'PrincipalClass'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-09-23 21:57:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6f0f4d8e5304001061b7ddeeff7b12e6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PrincipalClass</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">c60efc0f6d2220100acb70b3534330c0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6f0f4d8e5304001061b7ddeeff7b12e6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-10-29 22:25:36</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>552</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
